Ice::

She looked down at Lunarpine. She had a slight smile slip across her 
he face. She cold still read his mind even though he tried to hide 
his thoughts. She was pleased that he liked her new form. 

She looked at Veratis as he scanned her. She ws glad that the virus 
wasn't going to kill her or get her killed. "That is good news. But 
what happens now?"
She read his thoughts and the smile on her face dissappeared. She 
could read the anger in his mind. She lower her body down and changed 
into full bear mode. She took a step closer to Veratis. She put her 
thoughts in his head. "I'm sorry. I didn't think that I was hurting 
you. I was more afraid of what Lunarpine thought and didn't want to 
face that. I didn't think I could spread the virus as I was. I didn't 
know it could have the effect that it could have. Or that it was 
putting anything it touched in jeopardy."

She nuzzled her huge head against Veratis shoulder. "I'm sorry. I 
won't do it again."

She turned and faced Lunarpine. She smiled again and filled his head 
with thought of how much she cared for him and how much she had 
missed him.
